Tax losses carried forward have not been recognised at 31 December 2017. Whilst management forecast that taxable profits will be generated in the near future, there is a lack of evidenced profitability to date. Therefore, no deferred tax asset has been recognised on these losses as there is no certainty that sufficient profits will arise in future accounting periods from which these losses could be offset. The deferred tax asset in respect of tax losses and other deductible temporary difference not recognised in the Company Statement of Financial Position amounts to US$571,897 (2016: US$294,271).
